keyMoments.title: Luffy Refuses to Betray Ace and Sabo
keyMoments.description: Despite being brutally tortured by Porchemy, young Luffy refuses to reveal any information about Ace and Sabo's location or their stolen treasure.
keyMoments.significance: This moment demonstrates Luffy's unwavering loyalty and establishes the deep bond between the three brothers. Luffy's refusal to betray his friends despite extreme pain shows his core character trait that persists throughout the series.
keyMoments.quote: I won't tell you anything! Not even if you kill me!

keyMoments.title: Ace and Sabo Accept Luffy
keyMoments.description: After rescuing Luffy and witnessing his loyalty, Ace and Sabo begin to accept him as a true friend and brother.
keyMoments.significance: This marks the beginning of the brotherly bond between Luffy, Ace, and Sabo that becomes one of the most important relationships in the series.
keyMoments.quote: Don't die! You're my only family apart from Garp!

reveals.information: Even as a child, Luffy demonstrated absolute loyalty to his friends, refusing to betray them under torture

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace Refuses to Run from a Fight
keyMoments.description: When Sabo suggests they grab Luffy and escape, Ace refuses, declaring that he never runs away from a fight. He chooses to confront Porchemy directly.
keyMoments.significance: This establishes Ace's core character trait of never backing down, which defines his actions throughout the series and ultimately leads to his fate at Marineford.
keyMoments.quote: I never run away from a fight!

keyMoments.title: Ace and Sabo Defeat Porchemy
keyMoments.description: Ace and Sabo work together to defeat Porchemy and rescue Luffy from captivity.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the teamwork between Ace and Sabo and their willingness to risk themselves to save Luffy.

reveals.information: Ace's philosophy of never running from a fight is established in his childhood

keyMoments.title: Sabo Helps Defeat Porchemy
keyMoments.description: Sabo initially tries to get Ace to flee with Luffy, but when Ace refuses, Sabo chooses to fight alongside him to defeat Porchemy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sabo's loyalty to his friends and his willingness to fight when necessary.

keyMoments.title: Sabo Decides to Stay with Dadan Family
keyMoments.description: After the incident with Porchemy, Sabo chooses to remain at Mt. Colubo with the Dadan Family alongside Ace and Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Sabo's commitment to his bond with Ace and Luffy, leaving behind his previous life.

reveals.information: Sabo joins the Dadan Family to stay with Ace and Luffy

keyMoments.title: Porchemy Tortures Luffy
keyMoments.description: Porchemy brutally interrogates young Luffy, using spiked gloves and other torture methods to try to extract information about Ace and Sabo's stolen treasure.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Porchemy as a cruel villain and tests Luffy's loyalty to his friends.

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Kills Porchemy
keyMoments.description: After being defeated by Ace and Sabo, Porchemy is executed by his own captain, Bluejam, for failing his mission.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Bluejam's cruelty and the ruthless nature of the pirate world. This is Porchemy's final appearance.

statusHistory.reason: Executed by Bluejam for failing to retrieve information from Luffy

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Executes Porchemy
keyMoments.description: Bluejam shoots and kills his own crew member Porchemy for failing to defeat the children and retrieve the stolen treasure.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Bluejam as a ruthless and cruel captain who has no tolerance for failure.

reveals.information: Bluejam is cruel enough to execute his own crew members for failure

keyMoments.title: Dadan Accepts Sabo into Her Family
keyMoments.description: Dadan allows Sabo to stay with her family alongside Ace and Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Dadan's willingness to take in another child despite her complaints.
